title: On sanction of SRS, rights of imlamalik, municipal tenants or any other tenancy shall stand terminated in respect of the sanctioned SRS
clause_text: On sanction of SRS, rights of imlamalik, municipal tenants or any other tenancy shall stand terminated in respect of the sanctioned SRS.

source_pdf.text_snippet: On sanction of SRS, rights of imlamalik, municipal tenants or any other tenancy shall stand terminated in respect of the sanctioned SRS.
